Body: BIOTOR  Biotor decentralizes biomass and makes biomass 2.0 transparent for the future. With our new technology, we are upgrading biomass to clean energy. _______________________________________________________________________________                      WEBSITE | EMAIL | WHITEPAPER | FACEBOOK | YOUTUBE | TELEGRAM     12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334 What Is Biotor?   Biotor BV is a Dutch company that was founded in 2013 with the objective to contribute to the production of clean energy. From 2013, Biotor has built a number of pilot plants under our own management, now the time has come to put our installation on the market and link it to a worldwide franchise organization.    FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS   123456789101112   13141516171819202122232425262728293031323334  How Does The Technique Work? Torrefaction is a new technique where biomass is roasted as it were. This is best compared with roasting coffee beans. This enables us to process almost all carbonaceous materials into new biomass 2.0 123456789101112  13141516171819202122232425262728293031323334  Why This Token Issue? It is difficult for companies such as Biotor BV that make an innovative contribution to clean energy to obtain financing through the regular route. That is why Biotor BV has opted for this token issue. 123456789101112  13141516171819202122232425262728293031323334  In What Way Does Biotor Different From It's Competitors? We believe that energy is one of the primary necessities of life, then we believe that the energy market should under no circumstances be subject to speculative mechanisms of the market. Biotor distinguishes itself from the competition by being able to use entirely new raw materials by means of a new technique that has been obtained through its own development. In addition, we keep this technology under our own management by working together with franchise companies. 123456789101112  13141516171819202122232425262728293031323334  How Many Tokens Are Spent?  In total Biotor BV gives 4,240,000 tokens from 240,000 in the presale phase and 4,000,000 in the main sale. All non-issued tokens are burned afterwards. 123456789101112  13141516171819202122232425262728293031323334  What Does a BBT Token Cost? A Biotor Biomass Token costs â‚¬ 0.25, - euro, which is $ 0.29, which corresponds to 0.0063 Ether. These amounts may fluctuate somewhat because they are subject to fluctuations. 123456789101112  13141516171819202122232425262728293031323334  Is BAT Subject To Certain Requirements? No we accept all offers. Biotor issues the ICO + so that investors acquire control and shares in the company. All tokens will be credited to the share register of Biotor BV by means of a notarial deed. This means we meet the standard standards that apply in the Netherlands.
